title: "Can Mayor Adams speak Mandarin? No, but AI can help him robocall in different languages"
excerpt: "New York City Mayor Eric Adams has been using artificial intelligence to make robocalls that contort his own voice into several languages he doesn’t actually speak, posing new ethical questions about the government’s use of the rapidly evolving technology."
